Topic.Title: So... my gamebooks are entirely deleting themselves.

Posts.EditableText: They were working fine a couple days ago, but today, when I open a Squiffy gamebook to edit and then close it, the next time I open it it's a blank document. Projects I started years ago are entirely gone. I see no way of recovering them. Has anyone else had this problem?

Posts.EditableText: This has been brought up in the forum before. Once published, your *Squiffy code* no longer receives attention. It may remain for a spell, but will get eaten by the internet gnomes after a while. If you wish to continue tweaking, save your Squiffy code in your own system. If you don't want to download Squiffy, you can save your code in a plain text text editor.
